body_html:
Thanks for the detailed comments.

The Notebook for my Tutorial 15 has a slightly awkward implementation of this idea. The implementation I wrote above is cleaner.

However, from your comments I can see that the idea is still not perfectly clear. I think it would help if I write a Python Notebook to demonstrate it, and then perhaps you can give suggestions on where it might belong in TensorFlow and possibly how to improve the implementation.

But I'm currently busy doing some research related to TensorFlow, so I'll have to come back to this thread later. It will probably be several weeks or more.

body:
Thanks for the detailed comments.

The Notebook for my Tutorial 15 has a slightly awkward implementation of this idea. The implementation I wrote above is cleaner.

However, from your comments I can see that the idea is still not perfectly clear. I think it would help if I write a Python Notebook to demonstrate it, and then perhaps you can give suggestions on where it might belong in TensorFlow and possibly how to improve the implementation.

But I'm currently busy doing some research related to TensorFlow, so I'll have to come back to this thread later. It will probably be several weeks or more.
